name: Alien Arcade Attack
description:
Do you miss those days in the 80's where you spent all your quarters defeating aliens. Well so did we, so we made

Alien Arcade Attack! The strength of your opponents is randomly increased based on your difficulty choice.

(Multiple Hits will be Needed) This allows for varied game play every time. See if you can battle well enough to

make it onto our leaderboard.

Features Include:

9 hazards and enemies.

3 Levels of difficulty.

Optional Facebook Log In.

Facebook Auto Log-In.

Facebook Timeline Posting.

Facebook Friends Invite.

In-Game Rewards:

Triple Shot

Extra Ships

Point Bonuses

New Features Coming Soon:

Boss Aliens

In-Game Purchases

For more information visit us at https://solostudiosinteractive.com/
